metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart meets with Viconia who is still hooded. However Viconia soon reveals who she is and invites Shadowheart to speak down below in the Grotto.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the House of Grief with Shadowheart2. Sit on the bench3. Talk to Viconia

10.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
10.text: Do you know why you are here?

7.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
7.text: Do you know why you are here?
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player leaves the stone bench and Shadowheart takes their place

25.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
25.text: You seek to be Unburdened, yes? The Mapping of the Heart can reveal the way... yet there is another here whose need is great.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player leaves the stone bench and Shadowheart takes their place

51.speaker: Shadowheart
51.text: That voice... Allow me. I think I'm supposed to do this.
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player leaves the stone bench and Shadowheart takes their place

22.speaker: Player
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player leaves the stone bench and Shadowheart takes their place

11.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
11.text: Do you know why you are here?
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player leaves the stone bench and Shadowheart takes their place

28.text: I have a mission to fulfil. I must -
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

17.speaker: Shadowheart
17.text: I have a mission to fulfil. I must -
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

33.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
33.text: You had a mission, yes. But did you succeed? Or did you stray? Now give me the true answer - what is your purpose in being here?
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

4.speaker: Player
4.text: What's going on? Is this part of the Mapping?
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

39.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
39.text: Why map what is already known? Beside me is an ungrateful heart, a conniving heart, a shadow heart.

45.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
45.text: Now answer - what is your true purpose?

43.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
43.text: Why map what is already known? A disloyal heart, a craven heart, a shadow heart.

38.speaker: Player
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

34.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
34.text: I am the one who asks the questions. She is the one who answers. You are the one who remains silent.

30.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
30.text: Now if all our roles are clear, answer me. What is your true purpose?

3.speaker: Player
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: The artefact. I was sent to retrieve it. At any cost.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

14.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
14.text: And who tasked you with this mission?
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

50.speaker: Shadowheart
50.text: The Mother Superior, of Shar's... It's you.
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shocked expression as she realises who she is speaking toNodeContext: trails off mid-sentence as she realises she's speaking to her boss

6.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
6.text: Give me the honour of my name. In full.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: The cloaked figure stands and looms over Shadowheart

21.speaker: Shadowheart
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: The cloaked figure stands and looms over Shadowheart

13.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
13.text: I know what's in that head of yours better than you do, girl. My name.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The cloaked figure stands and looms over Shadowheart

1.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
1.text: You still have the wits to recognise your betters. Good.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The figure draws back her cowl. A drow woman. Ageless, elegant. Silver hair, cruel eyes. Viconia.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Viconia DeVir. If only Shar would bless me with the forgetting of your face.
8.context: NodeContext: Viconia and Jaheira are old enemies, sometimes allies. Not outright hatred between them, just vague dislike and even vaguer respect. Jaheira is responding to the fact that despite her memory loss, Shadowheart still recongises Viconia.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Viconia DeVir. If only Shar would bless me with the forgetting of your face.
20.context: NodeContext: Viconia and Jaheira are old enemies, sometimes allies. Not outright hatred between them, just vague dislike and even vaguer respect. Jaheira is responding to the fact that despite her memory loss, Shadowheart still recongises Viconia.

32.speaker: Jaheira
32.text: Viconia DeVir. If only Shar would bless me with the forgetting of your face.
32.context: NodeContext: Viconia and Jaheira are old enemies, sometimes allies. Not outright hatred between them, just vague dislike and even vaguer respect. Jaheira is responding to the fact that despite her memory loss, Shadowheart still recongises Viconia.

46.speaker: Minsc
46.text: You! Boo would have recognised your foul scent, if not for all this evil Sharran incense.

18.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
18.text: Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in what is to come.
18.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Now descend - you have much to answer for.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia's image fades away - an astral projection.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: Now descend - you have much to answer for.
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia's image fades away - an astral projection.

41.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
41.text: Now descend - you have much to answer for.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Viconia's image fades away - an astral projection.

23.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
23.text: An astral projection. We should take this one seriously - she's clever by half.
23.context: NodeContext: Unsurprised to see her old enemy dissipate before her. Sarcastic.

27.speaker: Lae'zel
27.text: An astral projection. We should take this one seriously - she's clever by half.
27.context: NodeContext: Unsurprised to see her old enemy dissipate before her. Sarcastic.

12.speaker: Jaheira
12.text: A projection. Let us find her in the flesh, then - so I can give her a hug.
12.context: NodeContext: Unsurprised to see her old enemy dissipate before her. Sarcastic.

19.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
19.text: An astral projection. It is just like a DeVir to avoid facing danger in the flesh. They always were a family of cowards.
19.context: NodeContext: DeVir (de'vɪə) - a drow noble house that Minthara has no love for. Scornful.

36.speaker: Wyll
36.text: She hides behind a projection. It's time we find the Mother Superior in flesh.
36.context: NodeContext: Loud overreaction to Viconia's projection fading away, then immediate correction. Not bashful at all - OBVIOUSLY it's a projection, he knew that.

40.speaker: Gale
40.text: An astral projection. Seems she's taking no chances with us.
40.context: NodeContext: Loud overreaction to Viconia's projection fading away, then immediate correction. Not bashful at all - OBVIOUSLY it's a projection, he knew that.

44.speaker: Astarion
44.text: An astral projection? Clever girl, she's not taking any chances. We shouldn't either.
44.context: NodeContext: Loud overreaction to Viconia's projection fading away, then immediate correction. Not bashful at all - OBVIOUSLY it's a projection, he knew that.

47.speaker: Minsc
47.text: A GHOST! Wait, no. A projection, says Boo.
47.context: NodeContext: Loud overreaction to Viconia's projection fading away, then immediate correction. Not bashful at all - OBVIOUSLY it's a projection, he knew that.

48.speaker: Halsin
48.text: An astral projection...? Cunning of her. Not to mention untrusting.

26.speaker: Karlach
26.text: An astral projection. Very clever. I'll stay on my toes around this one.

49.speaker: Shadowheart
49.text: There is something I lost... no, had taken from me. My family. My life. I want it all back -

42.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
42.text: Loss is a gift, girl. Do you still not understand that? Now give me the true answer - what is your purpose in being here?

16.speaker: Inquirer of Grief
16.text: You cow her so easily? I had thought I sensed more strength to her. Perhaps not... We shall begin.
